videos.title: Pony Express 120 Gravel Dash - Marysville, KS
videos.description:
🚴‍♂️ Ready to ride? Watch Aaron Hoffman, a proud Marysville High School alum, take on the Pony Express 120 Gravel Dash! 🏁

Whether you're a seasoned rider or just getting started, Marysville's scenic routes are calling. Get inspired by Aaron's journey and start planning your ride around town.

And it's never too early to start gearing up for next year’s Pony Express 120 Gravel Dash. Make Marysville your go-to biking destination.

#bestsmalltowns #kansastourism #travel2024
tags: Best things to do in Kansas

videos.title: 2021 Pony Express Gravel Dash 120!
videos.description:
#biggravelmiles #keepcrushingit
I had heard from so many people how great this race was so I knew I had to do it.  It did not disappoint!  The communication prior to the race was outstanding, the support during the race was top shelf and the course was absolutely gorgeous.  If you love gravel, this is a race you need on your calendar.  Oh, and don't eat like I did before a race like this!

Strava link to my race: https://www.strava.com/activities/5944681744

videos.title: 2024 Pony Express 120 Gravel Dash Bikepacking Event
videos.description: The event was part of the PXGD gravel events held over the weekend of September 6-7, 2024. The rides departed and returned to Marysville, KS. The bikepacking event covered 120 miles of mostly gravel roads. We stayed overnight at Rock Creek State Historical Park near Endicott, Nebraska. This park was where travelers on the California and Oregon Trail could resupply. It was also the location of a swing station for the Pony Express riders.

videos.title: 2023 Pony Express Gravel Dash - 120 Mile Single Speed Relay
videos.description: Fun gravel event out of Marysville, Kansas. Justin, Jackie and I gathered our Stormchasers and headed down for the Gravel Dash... ended up taking second place, losing to the first place team by only 13 minutes.

videos.title: Pony Express 120 Gravel Dash
videos.description:
Event is Saturday September 7, 2019 in Marysville, KS

Online Registration Deadline: Monday, Sep 2, 2019 at 8:00 PM CT
